column1: It was a pleasure to meet with @ksnurses to receive an update on their response to COVID-19 and PPE deliveries.   Thank you to all our health care heroes working on the frontlines to keep our families safe!  #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/wZzW2IN6ve

Visited Advent Health in Ottawa today to learn more about Franklin county's response to COVID-19.   Thank you to our health care heroes for keeping our communities safe!  #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/GCq4JA9oUW

The @China_TaskForce interim report clearly finds that the #CCP covered up the Coronavirus which directly lead to the epidemic becoming a pandemic.   China must be held accountable.   #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/62SExYriRZ

Great to visit with Linn county EOC and community leaders to discuss the federal response to COVID-19.  As we begin to reopen it is essential federal state and municipal leaders work together to ensure we protect Kansans’ lives and livelihoods.   #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/QQj4WnXWgg

It was so great to catch up with my friends at  @AIPAC yesterday we discussed US and Israeli cooperation to tackle the global COVID-19 pandemic @SecPompeo's visit to Israel and ways to maintain a strong and prosperous cooperation. I will always stand with Israel.  #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/9rKgoy1MLv

Protecting workers during #COVID19 is of the utmost importance.  I was glad to take part in today’s @EdLaborGOP hearing with @OSHA_DOL & @NIOSH   #ksleg #KS02 https://t.co/yowBNMbfTn https://t.co/ZhyftoTP97

Are you a farmer or rancher whose operations were directly impacted by COVID-19?    Apply for the Coronavirus Food Assistance Program through @USDA that provides direct relief to producers.    https://t.co/h5gmShAfnK   #KS02 #ksleg

Had a great meeting with members of @GrowthEnergy where we discussed the impact COVID-19 has had on the renewable fuels industry and how Congress can help moving forward.   I will always fight for our farmers and the future of renewable fuels.   #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/8UjeC0OrzK

Join us LIVE now on @KSNTNews @fox4kc or online at https://t.co/6cAeDSPTAC for the #KSTownHall to discuss the Federal #COVID19 Response with the entire Kansas Delegation.   https://t.co/suOh5HyXkT  #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/4MbDiaUee9

The @WhiteHouse Coronavirus Task Force acted early & decisively unleashing the full powers of the federal government (@SBAgov @USTreasury @NationalGuard @USDA @DeptVetAffairs @HHSGov & others) to combat the Coronavirus.    #KS02 #ksleg

Tune in @ 4:10pm CT for another important #COVID19 Teletown hall featuring experts from our Kansas Ag community.    https://t.co/TyTSJBIbyF   #KS02 #ksleg @newsfromkla @kscorn @KansasWheat https://t.co/aos5GT0tOc

Always a pleasure to join my friends at @kansasrealtors to discuss the federal government’s response to the health and economic crisis caused by #Covid19.    I’m proud to be your voice in Congress.    #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/PPQHQETAMQ
Great to check in and provide a federal update with the Wilson County EOC on COVID-19.   We are #InItTogether   #ksleg #KS02 https://t.co/RYWwBuvQwn

.@POTUS @realDonaldTrump @VP the @WhiteHouse Coronavirus Task Force and I are fighting for Kansas  So far... ☑️ 180k N95 Masks ☑️ 4.8mil Surgical & Procedural Masks  ☑️ 98k Eye and Face Shields  ☑️ 1.3mil Isolation & Surgical Gowns ☑️ 98mil Surgical & Exam Gloves   #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/WKEK0xZMSp
Spoke w/@GCSAA--based in Lawrence-- on the best ways to get America back to work and ideas for the next Covid-19 relief package.  #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/etVhjbiVSx

Join me tomorrow at 3:40pm CT for a special Telephone Town Hall with a policy expert from @HouseVetAffairs and CEO and Chief of Communications and Public Relations of @VAEasternKansas to discuss the impact #COVID19 has had on veterans and the @DeptVetAffairs.    #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/aMhTUjwndk

Glad I could join KGGF of #SEKS to talk a host of topics from reopening our country to the federal response to the Coronavirus.    I'm always fighting for you.   Listen to the full interview here:  https://t.co/9onrociXKK   #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/nK1Z0ASRxj

ICYMI: I spoke to the @WhiteHouse over the weekend about the new PPE heading to KS to help fight #COVID19. I'm proud to be working with @realDonaldTrump @VP and the Coronavirus Task Force to deliver this PPE to our frontline heroes.    https://t.co/1eDZdYFdeu   #KS02 #ksleg

I am proud to be working alongside @POTUS and the Coronavirus Task Force to deliver these much needed supplies to our frontline heroes. Kansans are determined to win this war against COVID-19.  #KS02 #ksleg
Spoke with the @WhiteHouse over the weekend and happy to share that @realDonaldTrump and the Coronavirus Task force are delivering a shipment of 550k N95 masks and 13k Tyvek suits to Kansas.

A big THANK YOU to our Kansas farmers feeding our families and keeping our shelves stocked.   I'm glad to talk with the @KSFarmBureau leadership team about the federal response to COVID-19 and how Congress is taking care of our farmers and ranchers.  #KS02 #ksleg #KsAg https://t.co/G2KfZuLTnf

.@OttawaKSChamber talking @SBAgov loans health care and everything #COVID19 .   I will continue to work with all federal state and local stakeholders to ensure we have the resources and plan in place to win this war against COVID-19.  #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/2wWq0USTCZ

It was my honor to provide an update to the Leavenworth County Commission on Congress's response combating COVID-19.  The federal government must work together with state and local officials to defeat this disease.  https://t.co/6IV57jv239  #KS02 #ksleg

Glad I could join @wibw's @Melissa_Brunner for a conversation on opening up the economy and the effect #COVID19 has had on Kansas hospitals.   My goal is twofold: to protect the lives and livelihoods of the people of Kansas.  Watch ⬇️   #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/J7cRN3iYbF

The @WHO has failed in its response to COVID-19.  The United States must act to ensure hard-earned taxpayer dollars are not going to an organization afraid of exposing CCP lies and the true impact of COVID-19.   I am proud to join @GReschenthaler on this resolution.  #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/TjFLj0rSOn

“Congressman Watkins announced @HHSGov grants to help combat COVID-19.  These grants awarded directly to community health providers come from the passage of the #CARESAct which Congressman Watkins spoke in support of on the House Floor.”  https://t.co/GUnXY2w0Zv  #KS02 #ksleg

Health care workers across #KS02 are fighting on the front lines to keep our families safe during this health crisis. Congress has come together to support them and provide resources necessary to win the war against COVID-19.  https://t.co/SWvLSg5ofW  #ksleg

Thank you to the Kansans who remain hard at work keeping the shelves stocked and putting food on the table for all Americans as we fight the spread of the Coronavirus.   #KS02 #ksleg #InItTogether https://t.co/z1lk7quS0z

Doctors are on the front lines of the war against the Coronavirus. They are fighting every day to ensure our families are safe and healthy.   On this #NationalDoctorsDay I want to thank all those selflessly serving. The world is forever grateful.  #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/V0WGyWZxwy
